358: Summary Posted: May 4, 2023 Weekly Hours: 40 Role Number: 200476825 The Visuals Studio supporting Apple Services is a fast-paced, multi-disciplinary creative team that defines how best-in-class photography, video, and art bring all of our Services products to life. We work across products like Music, TV, Books, Podcasts, Arcade, and App Store and more. The Video Creative Director is responsible for setting the vision for original and supplied video, tailored to the unique opportunities and needs of each service. This role will oversee strategy, development and execution of live action video, motion graphics, and animation across projects that range from large first-of-their-kind launches to small, one-off exercises, working closely with Apple’s product design, brand design and content teams! The ideal candidate has a seasoned background in video strategy and a passion for storytelling, design, media and technology. Key Qualifications 10-15 years of experience as an ACD or Creative Director in a creative-focused agency or in-house at a leading brand. A diverse portfolio of award-winning digital creative work. Expert in short form and serial video content, and understands how to make digital video that compels a user to watch. Experience analyzing trends in viewership and how to use data to measure the success of digital video concepts. Great writer who has strong narrative skills and understands the nuances of the Apple voice. Top notch people manager; this role oversees a small team of motion creatives, and good management and mentorship are paramount. Ability to distill complex ideas into succinct, beautifully designed presentation decks, and have substantial experience with presenting to a wide range of audiences from internal team up to executive. Thrives while juggling multiple projects at one time, and can provide clear and timely direction and effective feedback across multiple mediums from including static, motion and live action. Strong interpersonal skills. Naturally collaborative, even under pressure. A positive force that elevates the work of the people around you. An incredible eye for detail, and meticulousness that matches Apple’s own.
